description: Historical master_rules built from git history. Shows all files that EVER existed in the project.

project_files.description: Master list of all component JSON files that have ever existed in the project.

git_history.description: Git history used to build this master_rules

commits.message: Add missing gpio_pair_vibration_sensor interface and comprehensive validation script
Convert all 552 JSON files from UTF-8 BOM to UTF-8 without BOM
Enhanced copilot-instructions.md with critical breakage-prevention rules
Add operator+ and operator+= with saturation to all display Pixel types
Add maxRed/maxGreen/maxBlue constants to all Pixel structures
Cleanup: Remove long display names, fix positioned/ references, update naming rules
Update basic rules in .github directory - hand-edited AI agent rules, component JSON requirements, copilot instructions, and naming rules
Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/reussered/p32-animatronic-bot
feat: Implement comprehensive validation and rule engine
Consolidated rules and added template syntax documentation for component functions
Implement component scaffolding and multi-hardware template system

Flying Dragon Component Organization Complete: Consolidated all flight systems, power management, and creature behavior into proper directory structure. Created flying_dragon_power_system in dragons/body/. All components now have 3-file sets (json, src, hdr) in correct locations. Added HTML versions of power/battery research docs.
RULE updates: bounded authority framework, six-file generation architecture, subsystem versioning and upconversion
Reorganize component structure per RULE 6: move to bot_families structure with subsystems (head/torso/arms/legs/etc), consolidate generic components, remove obsolete creature_specific directory

CONSOLIDATE RULES: Merge all rules into AI-AGENT-RULES.md as single source of truth. Add RULE 11C (timing guidelines) and RULE 11D (JSON encoding validation). Delete redundant documents (naming_rules.md, component-json-requirements.md, consolidated-rules.md). Update multi-family types to filesystem reality (humanoid/quadruped/tentacles/wings). Fix file paths in RULE 9 to match generator output (src/subsystems/{name}/).

Move audit report to docs/audit/. Keep .github/ minimal: only AI-AGENT-RULES.md and copilot-instructions.md. Rationale: Agent must read rules before touching project - single rulesets enforce this discipline.

RULE 0: Add mandatory verification gate requiring both rule files be read before ANY work. Include checklist questions to verify comprehension, cite applicable rules in decision authority, add final NEVER clause about working without reading rules.
Fix RULE 0: Move final NEVER clause into bullet list format
ACTIVATE: validate_file_structure.py - auto-correct component references and enforce RULE 4/6
UPDATE: copilot-instructions.md - Make validate_file_structure.py mandatory step
